com.cubeia.firebase.api.service
Class ServiceContextAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.cubeia.firebase.api.service.ServiceContextAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Context, ServiceContext
public class ServiceContextAdapter
extends Object
implements ServiceContext

NB: This class is within the public API because of build reasons, it should only be used for testing! It will be moved shortly. See Trac issue #417.

This adapter has the following attributes:

  • It uses the platform mbean server
  • It has a "set-able" service registry

Author:
Larsan

Method Detail

getDeploymentClassLoader

public ClassLoader getDeploymentClassLoader()
Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
Get the class loader used by the server as a parent for specific deployments. In other words, this class loader will be the parent to all deployed game, service and tournament class loaders.

Specified by:
getDeploymentClassLoader in interface ServiceContext
Returns:
The class loader used as a parent for deployment loaders, never null

getMBeanServer

public MBeanServer getMBeanServer()
Specified by:
getMBeanServer in interface ServiceContext
Returns:
The mbean server used by the server, never null

getName

public String getName()
Specified by:
getName in interface ServiceContext
Returns:
The configured name of the service, or null if not configured

getParentRegistry

public ServiceRegistry getParentRegistry()
Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
This method provides access to the registry to which the service belongs. It can be noted that services should not use each other during the initialization phase. If they do depend on each other for startup they must declare so in their descriptors, please refer to the developers manual for more information.

Specified by:
getParentRegistry in interface ServiceContext
Returns:
The registry to which the service belongs, never null

Specified by:
getPublicId in interface ServiceContext

The configured public id of the service, never null

getResourceLocator

public ResourceLocator getResourceLocator()
Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
The resource locator is for reading resources from the game archive. This can be used to load configuration etc.

Specified by:
getResourceLocator in interface ServiceContext
Returns:
A resource locator for the game archive, never null

Specified by:

setNodeListener

public void setNodeListener(NodeListener listener)
Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
This method can be called to register the service as a node listener. A null argument removed the listener.

Specified by:
setNodeListener in interface ServiceContext
Parameters:
listener - Listener to use, or null to remove
